title: Wear (simple) Filer
summary: The Wear (simple) Filer is simple filer for the Android Wear.
description: The Wear (simple) Filer can view the text file, the image file, the PDF file and the music file.With the Wear Filer, you will be able to send easily file from the mobile to the Android Wear.You can bring the file with the Android Wear any where . Let's enjoy!!
descriptionHTML:
The Wear (simple) Filer can view the text file, the image file, the PDF file and the music file.

With the Wear Filer, you will be able to send easily file from the mobile to the Android Wear.

You can bring the file with the Android Wear any where .

Let's enjoy!!
comments: Samsung galaxy s4 paired with moto 360 gen 2 not working! This app would be good if it worked. I am getting error code:4005 when I try to send a file. Please fix and I'll rate 5 stars.
Great App, only problem, I cant figure out how to delete uploaded stuff Its a great app that lets you upload anything but it doesnt say how to delete the files that you've uploaded
Works great! This app does exactly what it is advertised to do and I have had no problems!  I recommend the cheap ad removal and keep up the good work!
Superb Man this is very use full android wear app
Of no use Always crashes at start.. Error massage

Works as ADVERTISED! I don't review on much on Playstore  but I had to for this app. It's amazing and does as advertised, crashes sometimes though but I'm sure the developer will take care of that in the future version.
